channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Case of the Indiarubber Man
item.author: A Dixon Hawke Mystery
item.description: As a team, Miss Reesdale and Ginger Pryde were a success, which meant very big money. As separate personalities, neither was much of a box-office attraction, and Pryde fixed his spite on Miss Reesdale as a result of his sudden loss of fortune.
